title: Female x-ray technician's body found floating in river
desc: ALOR SETAR: The body of an X-ray technician was found floating in a river near Masjid Seberang Pumpong along the Sultanah Bahiyah Highway, here, on Wednesday (Feb 25) morning.

title: Machete-wielding attackers slash man outside commercial building in Penang

title: Vape Retailers Ban Sales to Under
desc: Indonesia’s vape retailers have banned sales to under-21s, backing government efforts to curb youth access to electronic cigarettes.
